page.title: 13VETINARY SURGEON
page.content: George Cooper is the owner of the {Vetinary Surgery,}which originally cost Â£70,000,including extra building. The most common animal that he treats is the cat, the most unusual being the Thai Water Dragon! Mr.Cooper treats about 300 animals per week, using all different kinds of medicines. There is an X-ray machine, with which to X-ray the animals. Mr. Cooper says he enjoys carrying out operations It costs Â£5 for a consultation, Â£15 to spey a cat, and Â£40 for a dog. Mr. Cooper has a machine for cleaning animals' teeth and one for sterilizing operation instruments.Mr.Cooper also has a number of animals of his own - a cat, dogs, a budgie, mice and several sheep, to name but a few.
